ValidationRule.description: When User Select TT of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then Enter data in Cheque/DD Amount (Rs.)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'TT') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c , 'Rupees') , NOT( ISBLANK( Cheque_DD_Amount_Rs__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting TT of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,You cann't enter in Cheque/DD Amount (Rs.)
